name: Netarhat Trekking
description: Scenic trekking routes in the 'Queen of Chotanagpur'.
longDescription: Netarhat offers breathtaking trekking paths through dense forests, hills, and valleys. Popular for sunrise and sunset viewpoints, it's ideal for hikers and nature enthusiasts.
history: Netarhat has been a British-era summer retreat, now a popular trekking destination.
speciality: Panoramic views and well-marked trekking trails.

name: Parasnath Hill Trek
description: Trekking to the highest peak in Jharkhand.
longDescription: Parasnath Hill offers trekking opportunities through dense forests and along historic Jain pilgrimage paths. Ideal for adventurous hikers and photographers.
history: Ancient Jain pilgrimage site and forested hill region.
thingsToCarry: Trekking gear, water, camera, comfortable shoes

name: Hazaribagh Lake Trek
description: Trekking around lakes and forested areas.
longDescription: Hazaribagh area offers trekking routes around serene lakes and dense forests, making it a perfect spot for adventure seekers and nature lovers.
thingsToCarry: Trekking shoes, water, camera, insect repellent

name: Dalma Hills Trek
description: Elephant sighting and trekking in Dalma Hills.
longDescription: Dalma Hills offers trekking through scenic paths with chances to spot elephants and other wildlife. Trails are suitable for both beginners and experienced trekkers.
history: Historically a natural reserve for local fauna.

name: Jonha Waterfall Adventure
description: Hiking and adventure near Jonha Falls.
longDescription: Jonha Falls offers adventure activities like hiking and rock climbing in scenic surroundings. The area is rich in natural beauty and suitable for family and solo adventurers.
history: Natural waterfall site in Ranchi district.

name: Hundru Waterfall Trek
description: Trekking to Hundru Falls, the highest waterfall in Jharkhand.
longDescription: Hundru Falls offers trekking trails through forests and rocky paths, leading to the spectacular waterfall. Ideal for photographers and adventure lovers.
history: Hundru Falls is a natural waterfall on the Subarnarekha River.
speciality: Highest waterfall in Jharkhand with trekking experience.

name: Trikut Hills Trek
description: Trek across three scenic peaks with forest trails.
longDescription: Trikut Hills features three peaks connected by trekking paths, offering panoramic views and moderate hiking challenges. Also a nearby pilgrimage site.
history: Ancient forested hills with cultural significance.
speciality: Three scenic peaks with forested trails.

name: Pardih Forest Adventure
description: Trekking and adventure in urban forest near Ranchi.
longDescription: Pardih Forest offers small trekking trails and adventure activities in an urban forest setting. Ideal for quick excursions and nature walks.
history: Local preserved forest area in Ranchi.
speciality: Urban forest trekking with picnic spots.
